description: Discover the story of the most popular sport in the West Indies and how it has impacted Caribbean culture.
learning_outcomes: Describe the historical origins of cricket in the West Indies.
Analyze the social and cultural impact of cricket on Caribbean society.
Explain the relationship between cricket and West Indian identity.
Discuss the role of cricket in shaping Caribbean politics.
Evaluate the contributions of key figures in West Indies cricket history.

original_data.Course Short Intro: Discover the story of the most popular sport in the West Indies and how it has impacted Caribbean culture.
original_data.Short Intro: Discover the story of the most popular sport in the West Indies and how it has impacted Caribbean culture.
original_data.Title: West Indies Cricket: Our Story
original_data.Topics related to CRM: Ancient History / Archaeology / British History / Irish History / Medieval History / Military History / Roman History / Social History / Ancient History / Archaeology / British History / Irish History / Medieval History / Military History / Roman History / Social History /

title: West Indies Cricket: Our Story

description: This course provides an introduction to using Python to analyze team performance in sports. Learners will discover a variety of techniques that can be used to represent sports data and how to extract narratives based on these analytical techniques. The main focus of the introduction will be on the use of regression analysis to analyze team and player performance data, using examples drawn from the National Football League NFL, the National Basketball Association NBA, the National Hockey League NHL, the English Premier LEague EPL, soccer and the Indian Premier League IPL, cricket.
learning_outcomes: Apply Python programming for sports data analysis.
Represent sports data using appropriate data structures.
Develop statistical models to analyze team performance.
Extract meaningful narratives from sports data.
Visualize sports data to communicate insights effectively.
Understand the fundamentals of sports analytics methodologies

original_data.Short Intro: This course provides an introduction to using Python to analyze team performance in sports. Learners will discover a variety of techniques that can be used to represent sports data and how to extract narratives based on these analytical techniques. The main focus of the introduction will be on the use of regression analysis to analyze team and player performance data, using examples drawn from the National Football League (NFL), the National Basketball Association (NBA), the National Hockey League (NHL), the English Premier LEague (EPL, soccer) and the Indian Premier League (IPL, cricket).
original_data.Title: Foundations of Sports Analytics: Data, Representation, and Models in Sports

title: Foundations of Sports Analytics: Data, Representation, and Models in Sports
